title: Ellipse and Polygon tools not appearing
content:
I have an older version of InDesign (the basic CS). When I hover over the rectangle tool or the rectangle frame tool, none of my other tools or frame tools appear. Is there another way to access them?

Thanks!

 [‹ 'Two sided' OpenType Script Question (Calt)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016080342/http:/typophile.com/node/37976 "Go to previous forum topic") [Another FontExplorer X problem ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016080342/http:/typophile.com/node/37949 "Go to next forum topic")
author: valeriew

comments.content:
Not sure if these are the same for ID CS1. May need to go to the manual.

[Toolbar Keyboard Shortcuts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016080342/http:/livedocs.adobe.com/en_US/InDesign/5.0/help.html?content=WSa285fff53dea4f8617383751001ea8cb3f-700d.html)
